```{r}
library(ape)
mytree <- read.tree("linum.tree") 
mytree
#tipstokeep <- source("tips.R")

tipstoremove <- setdiff(mytree$tip.label,tipstokeep)
tipstoremove

mytree <- drop.tip(mytree, tipstoremove)
mytree
write.tree(mytree, file= "linum.tree")

```
